title: CyberGamer Open Ladder Returns

embed.description: The CyberGamer studio is located in Adelaide at 10 Lagunta Ave, Edwardstown. Spectators are always welcome, view the events above for visitor information or open a support ticket.

body:
The CyberGamer Open Ladder is back, inviting any and all amateur teams in OCE to take part in 8 weeks of LoL action, culminating in a Top 8 finals series.

Matches will be open to be challenged and played from the 18 June, and sign ups are open throughout the main season of the ladder, so there is plenty of room for you and 4 mates to get together and onto the rift!

The ladder will run to an ELO format, for all additional information and rules you can check this link here: http://au.cybergamer.com/forums/thread/611508/CyberGamer-League-of-Legends-Open-Ladder-2017/ or the link included in the thread. Any additional questions are more than welcome to be directed to our friendly admins to help you out.

Entry is absolutely free, prizes are TBD at this stage.

Note: This ladder is not the Oceanic Open Ladder run by Riot, nor does it aim to be.

replies.body: Update on the CGo can be found here on LoL forums: https://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/E5MloWiP-cybergamer-open-ladder-update-finals-and-prizes
